page.title: 13Crime in Darlaston
page.content: We went out on the 14th of June 1985 to ask people some questions about crime. We did it because we wanted to know what people think about crime in Darlaston. 75% of the people think crime is out of control. Most people think criminals don't care when they have commited a crime. 70% of people think judges are too lenient. The most frequent crimes in Darlaston are Burglary,Vandalism, Hooliganism. 152 people were asked about crime. 42 had crimes commited against them. The criminal was not caught most of the time. Here are the questions we asked. Have youn ever had crime commited against you? Where did the crime take place? Was the criminal caught?What do you think of the crime situation? How do you think criminals feel when they have commited a crime ?
